topMenuItems.name: Beef Burger
topMenuItems.description: Juicy ground beef patty with melted cheese, fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and pickles, served on a toasted brioche bun with special sauce

topMenuItems.name: Fish and Chips
topMenuItems.description: Beer-battered cod fillets fried until golden and crispy, served with thick-cut potato chips, tartar sauce, and malt vinegar

topMenuItems.name: Pad Kra Pao
topMenuItems.description: Thai holy basil stir-fry with minced chicken or pork, chili, garlic, served over rice and topped with a fried egg
